Date Validation

Aim of the date validator is to determine age based on the date inputs. Development will be on-going with the aim to speed up age validation in for Sprint 16.
Date Input
Date of Birth
Departure Date

Flight Validation: The date selected is valid for an Infant with an age of {{calculateAge()}}
Flight Validation: The date selected is valid for a Child with an age of {{calculateAge()}}
Flight Validation: The date selected is valid for an Adult with an age of {{calculateAge()}}
Hotel Validation: The date selected is valid for a Child with an age of {{calculateAge()}}
Warning: With the current date input, the passenger is an Adult in the flight segment and a child in the Hotel Segment. Age selected is {{calculateAge()}}
Warning: With the current date input, the passenger is an Infant in the flight segment and a child in the Hotel Segment. Age selected is {{calculateAge()}}
